column4: All Discovery phase tasks (Infrastructure Assessment, Workload Analysis, Requirements Gathering)
All Planning phase tasks (Architecture Design, Capacity Planning, Migration Planning)
All Development phase tasks (HyperFlex Deployment, vSphere Configuration, VM Migration)
All Testing phase tasks (Performance Testing, Failover Testing, Application Validation)
All Deployment phase tasks (Production Deployment, VM Migration, Cutover Support)
All Training phase tasks (Administrator Training, Operations Training, Documentation)
All Closeout phase tasks (Knowledge Transfer, Performance Baseline, Legacy Decommission)
Project management and technical leadership (25% of total engineering effort)

column3: Assess current servers storage and network infrastructure
Analyze VM workloads and resource requirements
Size HyperFlex cluster for current and future needs
Map application dependencies and migration priorities
Design fabric interconnect and network topology
Plan backup integration with Veeam or Commvault
Install and configure vSphere 8 on HyperFlex
Configure fabric interconnects and virtual networking
Configure HyperFlex storage and data services
Test storage and VM performance benchmarks
Test HA failover and node failure scenarios
Migrate final VMs and validate infrastructure
Train infrastructure team on HyperFlex operations
Train operations on monitoring and troubleshooting
Create runbooks SOPs and architecture docs

column4: Existing VMware Enterprise License Agreement credit
